      • load

        protected XMISymbolLoader load(java.lang.String stringUri)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads a new symbol based on the current symbol/resource context

        Note that the implementation caches by URI

        Parameters:
        uri - the URI from where to load the symbol
        Returns:
        a symbol loader
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong

      • getRoot

        public SymbolLoader getRoot()

      • createSubFactory

        public BasicViewElementFactory createSubFactory(SymbolLoader symbolLoader)
        Create a new factory with the resource root based on the provided symbol loader

        Since the factory holds a reference to the symbol loader, which is the context for resolving resource URIs, a new factory must be created for every child symbol.

        Parameters:
        symbolLoader - symbol loader, resource context for the new factory
        Returns:
        a new factory
